name: Bread and butter pickles
author: Hazel Luebbers
instructions: Cover cucumbers, onions and salt with cold water and ice cubes. Let sit about 3 hours. Do not use metal container. Mix sugar, vinegar, turmeric, cloves and celery seed and simmer 30 minutes. Pour cold water off cucumbers and pack in jars; cover with hot liquid. Process 10 minutes in hot water bath.
